features: SAFER INGREDIENTS: Same clean, simple, effective formula used in our Original Laundry Powder, now packaged in convenient, easy-to-use laundry pods. One laundry pod per one load of clothes. Gentle for sensitive skin, the environment, and most fabrics excluding silk and leather.

POWERFUL CLEAN: Active cleaning ingredients from mother nature, proven tough on stains and more effective than leading brands. Quick dissolving in all water temperatures, removes stains and rinses clean with no residual chemicals, artificial dyes or fragrances left on clothes - when we say clean, we mean it!

FOR ALL WASHERS: Works well with standard, commercial, and HE washing machines. Contains simple ingredients, produces minimal suds, is septic safe, and eliminates buildup left behind in clothing fibers from prior washing powders.

FOR MOTHERS EVERYWHERE: Clean with compassion. Made in the USA with earth- and plant-derived active cleaning ingredients and certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny. Gentle formula for people and the planet. Made with love from our family to yours.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: (1) 60 Count Pack of Molly's Suds Unscented Laundry Pods

Are Molly's Suds products safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Many of our customers have sensitive skin or eczema and that is why they use all of our products. There are no harsh or leaching chemicals and each product is clean rinsing. Are your detergents HE-friendly? Yes! All of our detergents are safe for standard, HE, and commercial washing machines. Our powder detergents do best when you add it directly to your drum and then toss in your laundry. Are your detergents septic-safe? Are they grey water safe? All of our laundry and cleaning products are septic-safe. Our Original Laundry Powder is grey water-safe, we even had it soil tested! Are Molly's Suds products safe to use while pregnant and/or for my baby's clothing? All of our products are safe to use during pregnancy. Our laundry products are all safe for use on baby clothing. Many parents choose our unscented laundry products for newborns, however our scented options are safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love the ingredients!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This detergent cleans our clothes and is easily accessible to buy. This doesn’t have dyes or phosphates (and more!) but that’s what we like about it. The peppermint doesn’t make your clothes smell minty, but fresh out of the bag the pods smell nice. The change is worth it for the health and well being of our family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Non-Toxic Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Did your skin ever feel “prickly” like you were getting poked by little pins after putting on clean clothes washed in traditional detergents? Well with this detergent, you no longer get this feeling. Not only does it wash your clothes extremely well, but it’s made will all clean ingredients. An added bonus is it doesn’t wear away at your clothes like traditional detergents! I have noticed less lint since switching to this one. I use a couple types of their detergents like their activewear one and a small bottle of special fabrics detergent! They all work perfectly! The only thing I would suggest is to break open the pod to sprinkle the detergent on your clothes if you are washing with cold water as the components clump together with cold water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fragrance is clean. Most detergents cause my grandson to break out. This cleans clothes well and no itching

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Occasionally leaves oily stains on my clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the laundry pods. They work well, are unscented and don't leave any residue. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but leaves residue.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t mind natural scents in my detergent but hate dyes. This smells good and has cleaned decently but many loads it doesn’t dissolve entirely and leaves residue on clothes. Not sure if I’ll buy again yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these laundry pods. Not toxic and still cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great alternative to the mainstream pod brands
reviews.reviewText: This is our go-to detergent. We wash on warm with 1 or 2 pods and they work great.
